column4: what are you trying to mount? (sorry, i left for a second so i could automount an NTFS partition..lol)
me? Trying to mount an encrypted LUKS partition properly. It's not really a big deal now since I already have Nautilus running the copy as root. I just didn't want to resort to that.
hmm, yeah, and running nautilus as root is kinda nasty anyway
sacarlson, don't worry about it, as long as I can back my data up this installation is getting nuked anyway.
